content: strawberry girl headband by the purple kitty make your own strawberry girl crocheted headband with my easy pattern the strawberry girl crocheted headband is adjustable you just tie it to fit your comfort because it s adjustable it comes in just two sizes making it easy to choose which to make it is also easy to customize to your preferred size *for personal use only this pattern is an original written by me brandy mesa owner of the purple kitty and you are prohibited from copying this pattern and distributing it to anyone in any way please do not use my photos as your own you may make as many as you like for yourself family friends and to sell but please refer back to me as the designer if possible i d love to see your strawberry girl headband tag me on instagram @thepurplekittyhooks and/or facebook the purple kitty use hashtags #thepurplekittyhooks and #pkhstrawberrygirl to be featured in stories feel free to message me from the platform you ordered from or message me through ig if you have any questions the purple kitty ©2025 1 difficulty level easy / beginner supplies cotton yarn #4 mercerized or non mercerized at least 20-25 grams for the pattern as written using the recommended yarns i used lion brand 24/7 mercerized and yarn bee fundamental cotton feel free to experiment with any type of yarn keeping in mind you may have to adjust starting chains depending on yarn thickness g hook 4 25 mm tapestry needle stitches used chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet berry stitch - yo insert hook yo and pull up a loop yo pull through one loop on hook yo insert hook yo and pull up a loop yo pull through all five loops on hook notes and tips the starting chain is always even the first chain 1 never counts as a stitch add or subtract the amount of starting chains to make your own preferred size to change the width stop after three row for a thinner headband or add two extra row for a wider headband it will always start and end with single_crochet row no matter how wide you make it always work in the back bumps of the chains for a smoother edge if you decide to add extra berries keep the ties no less than the 50 chains to make sure you have enough to tie into a cute little bow gauge since it s a very small project just measure the length after the first row of berries without the ties to make sure it s long enough for you sizes when following my pattern toddler / child motif is approximately 13 inches 36 inches total teen / adult motif is approximately 15 inches 38 inches total the purple kitty ©2025 2 happy crocheting the smaller size is referenced first with the larger size in parentheses chain 48 58 row 1 working in the bottom bumps single_crochet in 2nd
